author: MoneyTrail, LLC
description:
MoneyTrail is a free, online money management system for kids and teens. MoneyTrail keeps track of cash, allowance, IOUs & more from computers, tablets or cell phones.
MoneyTrail is an online tracking system that organizes the financial transactions between parents and teens.  We don’t handle your kid’s money.  We just keep track of it for you.  In the hustle and bustle of today’s busy world, MoneyTrail can make this part of parenting a little easier.

MoneyTrail Features
    * Tracks your kid’s money, including cash, allowance, IOUs and gift cards.
    * Current supported mobile devices include:  iPhone/iTouch/iPad, BlackBerry phones/tablets, Android phones/tablets and the Nintendo DSi.
    * Both parents and teens have accounts
       
Benefits for Parents
    *Options include:  one allowance payment, no allowance or Save, Spend, Share system.
    * Saves time by eliminating the hunt for the calendar to determine when allowance was last paid.
    * Helps you teach your child smart saving and spending skills.
    * Lets you keep cash in your wallet by paying your child with credit (IOUs).

Benefits for Kids and Teens
    * You have your own account and are in control of your money.
    * You can enter IOUs so that you get the money you are owed.
    * Runs on mobile phones so that you always know how much you have, even when you are at the mall with your parents.

Keeping track of your kid’s money and having them making wise choices with it is a skill that takes practice.  Learning to have a goal for their money also teaches kids and teens to avoid blowing their money on impulse purchases.  MoneyTrail is a free, online system that can organize kids’ money and keep kids and teens focused on their financial goals.
name: MoneyTrail
